/usr/lib/ccache/c++  -fPIC   -g  -Wl,-lc   -shared -Wl,-soname,libvtkCommonSystem-8.2.so.1 -o ../../lib/libvtkCommonSystem-8.2.so.1 CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkClientSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkDirectory.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkServerSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkSocket.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkSocketCollection.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkThreadMessager.cxx.o CMakeFiles/vtkCommonSystem.dir/vtkTimerLog.cxx.o ../../lib/libvtkCommonCore-8.2.so.1 ../../lib/libvtksys-8.2.so.1 -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/fenics/shared/VTK-build/lib:
